name: SnakeOut (ClamChowdeer)
description:
You (Snake), have been captured by the evil bird, Hawkins and you have to escape from its captivity by consuming foods to generate venom to shoot.  Beware as the time goes on, your body gets longer, traps are implemented by Hawkins and who knows when and where they will be spawned?

Controls:

Spacebar = Shoot

Arrow Keys = Move

Credits:

Music & SFX: Freesound.com

Assets: Me, myself and I
